message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $13,000 to start negotiations.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and what it can do for you.

Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,500. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $10,800. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
